com.esotericpig.jeso.botbuddy

Class BotBuddy.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.esotericpig.jeso.botbuddy.BotBuddy.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    BotBuddy

    public static class BotBuddy.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
     BotBuddy.Builder constructs a BotBuddy using the Builder Design Pattern.
 
 The logic in this class is very minimal, unless absolutely necessary.
    Author:
    Jonathan Bradley Whited (@esotericpig)
    See Also:
    Builder Pattern [Wikipedia]
